mapper.insert: INSERT INTO certificates (user_no, doctor_no, certificate_type, reference_id, purpose, status) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{doctorNo}, #{certificateType}, #{referenceId}, #{purpose}, #{status})
mapper.select: select c.*, u.user_name as doctorName, md.department_name as departmentName from certificates c join users u on c.doctor_no = u.user_no join doctors d on c.doctor_no = d.doctor_no join medical_department md on d.department = md.department_no where c.user_no = #{userNo}

select u.user_no, u.user_name, c.certificate_id, c.doctor_no, c.certificate_type, c.reference_id, c.content, c.note, c.purpose, c.status, r.diagnosis, h.disease_name, h.start_date, h.end_date from users u join certificates c on u.user_no = c.user_no LEFT JOIN medical_records r ON (c.certificate_type IN (1, 2) AND c.reference_id = r.record_id AND u.user_no = r.user_no) LEFT JOIN hospitalization h ON (c.certificate_type = 3 AND c.reference_id = h.hospitalization_id AND u.user_no = h.user_no) where c.doctor_no = #{doctorNo}

SELECT u.user_name, u.user_rrn, u.user_add, u.user_add2, u.phone, r.diagnosis, r.outbreak_at, r.create_at AS visit_at, c.content, c.note, c.purpose, c.reference_id, d.user_name AS doctor_name, h.room_type, h.seat_no, h.disease_name, h.start_date, h.due_date, h.end_date, md.department_name FROM certificates c JOIN users u ON c.user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN medical_records r ON (c.certificate_type IN (1, 2) AND c.reference_id = r.record_id AND u.user_no = r.user_no) LEFT JOIN hospitalization h ON (c.certificate_type = 3 AND c.reference_id = h.hospitalization_id AND u.user_no = h.user_no) LEFT JOIN medical_department md ON h.department_no = md.department_no LEFT JOIN users d ON c.doctor_no = d.user_no WHERE c.certificate_id = #{certificateId};
mapper.update: UPDATE certificates SET user_no = #{userNo}, doctor_no = #{doctorNo}, certificate_type = #{certificateType}, content = #{content}, note = #{note}, purpose = #{purpose}, create_at = NOW(), valid_until = #{validUntil}, status = #{status} WHERE certificate_id = #{certificateId}
